General.Name: Korporacja Gospodarcza efekt S.A
General.Description: Korporacja Gospodarcza efekt S.A. engages in leasing and renting properties, premises, and commercial units. It also provides consultancy related to business and management, advertising, and other commercial activities; financial services activities; investment activities in the financial instruments market; wholesale and retail trade on foreign markets; export and import of goods and services; and provision of commercial brokerage services, including commodity sales and trading conducted on stock exchanges. In addition, it provides warehousing services; and organizes and manages production activities primarily for countryside and agriculture. Further, it operates hotels and shopping complexes; and rents real estate properties. The company was formerly known as Przedsiebiorstwo Transportu i Uslug "efekt' S.A. and changed its name to Korporacja Gospodarcza efekt S.A. in 1992. Korporacja Gospodarcza efekt S.A. was founded in 1989 and is based in Kraków, Poland.
